column17:
Peppertree Regular Fit Women's Trousers Price: Rs.1295

Say hello to the culottes - the latest trend in town! Sophisticated and chic these trendy pants though hang loose like a skirt act very much like the very well cut pants that they are. Roomy and comfortable with an elasticated waist these cotton culottes come with warli and contrast wavy prints at the asymmetrical hemline. The contrast stitch detailing adds the finishing touches to this show-stealer! These culottes beg to be paired with heels for that oh-so-yummy leg-elongating look. Wear a tube top over it for a pub crawl or a nice white shirt for work - either way all eyes will be on you!
